mapper.sql: SALES_ORG_ID, CODE, NAME, DESCRIPTION, PARENT_ORG_ID, MARKET_ID, LOCATION_ID, SALES_FLAG, DEFAULT_FLAG, ENABLED_FLAG, START_ACTIVE_DATE, END_ACTIVE_DATE, OBJECT_VERSION_NUMBER, REQUEST_ID, PROGRAM_ID, CREATION_DATE, CREATED_BY, LAST_UPDATED_BY, LAST_UPDATE_DATE, LAST_UPDATE_LOGIN, ATTRIBUTE_CATEGORY, ATTRIBUTE1, ATTRIBUTE2, ATTRIBUTE3, ATTRIBUTE4, ATTRIBUTE5, ATTRIBUTE6, ATTRIBUTE7, ATTRIBUTE8, ATTRIBUTE9, ATTRIBUTE10, ATTRIBUTE11, ATTRIBUTE12, ATTRIBUTE13, ATTRIBUTE14, ATTRIBUTE15
mapper.insert:
select UNIX_TIMESTAMP()*1000+floor(rand()*1000) from dual
insert into SPM_SALES_ORGANIZATION_B (SALES_ORG_ID, CODE, NAME, DESCRIPTION, PARENT_ORG_ID, MARKET_ID, LOCATION_ID, SALES_FLAG, DEFAULT_FLAG, ENABLED_FLAG, START_ACTIVE_DATE, END_ACTIVE_DATE, OBJECT_VERSION_NUMBER, REQUEST_ID, PROGRAM_ID, CREATION_DATE, CREATED_BY, LAST_UPDATED_BY, LAST_UPDATE_DATE, LAST_UPDATE_LOGIN, ATTRIBUTE_CATEGORY, ATTRIBUTE1, ATTRIBUTE2, ATTRIBUTE3, ATTRIBUTE4, ATTRIBUTE5, ATTRIBUTE6, ATTRIBUTE7, ATTRIBUTE8, ATTRIBUTE9, ATTRIBUTE10, ATTRIBUTE11, ATTRIBUTE12, ATTRIBUTE13, ATTRIBUTE14, ATTRIBUTE15 ) values (#{salesOrgId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{parentOrgId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{marketId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{locationId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{salesFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{defaultFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{enabledFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{startActiveDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{endActiveDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, 1, -1, -1, sysdate, -1, -1, sysdate, #{lastUpdateLogin,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{attributeCategory,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attribute1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attribute2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attribute3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attribute4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attribute5,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attribute6,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attribute7,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attribute8,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attribute9,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attribute10,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attribute11,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attribute12,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attribute13,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attribute14,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attribute15,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

select UNIX_TIMESTAMP()*1000+floor(rand()*1000) from dual

mapper.update:
update SPM_SALES_ORGANIZATION_B
CODE = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DESCRIPTION = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PARENT_ORG_ID = #{parentOrgId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
MARKET_ID = #{marketId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
LOCATION_ID = #{locationId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
SALES_FLAG = #{salesFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DEFAULT_FLAG = #{defaultFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ENABLED_FLAG = #{enabledFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
START_ACTIVE_DATE = #{startActiveDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
END_ACTIVE_DATE = #{endActiveDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
OBJECT_VERSION_NUMBER = OBJECT_VERSION_NUMBER + 1,
REQUEST_ID = #{requestId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
PROGRAM_ID = #{programId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CREATED_BY = #{createdBy,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
LAST_UPDATED_BY = #{lastUpdatedBy,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
LAST_UPDATE_DATE = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
LAST_UPDATE_LOGIN = #{lastUpdateLogin,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ATTRIBUTE_CATEGORY = #{attributeCategory,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ATTRIBUTE1 = #{attribute1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ATTRIBUTE2 = #{attribute2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ATTRIBUTE3 = #{attribute3,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ATTRIBUTE4 = #{attribute4,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ATTRIBUTE5 = #{attribute5,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ATTRIBUTE6 = #{attribute6,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ATTRIBUTE7 = #{attribute7,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ATTRIBUTE8 = #{attribute8,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ATTRIBUTE9 = #{attribute9,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ATTRIBUTE10 = #{attribute10,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ATTRIBUTE11 = #{attribute11,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ATTRIBUTE12 = #{attribute12,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ATTRIBUTE13 = #{attribute13,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ATTRIBUTE14 = #{attribute14,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ATTRIBUTE15 = #{attribute15,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where SALES_ORG_ID = #{salesOrgId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

update SPM_SALES_ORGANIZATION_B set CODE = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DESCRIPTION = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PARENT_ORG_ID = #{parentOrgId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, MARKET_ID = #{marketId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, LOCATION_ID = #{locationId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, SALES_FLAG = #{salesFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DEFAULT_FLAG = #{defaultFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ENABLED_FLAG = #{enabledFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, START_ACTIVE_DATE = #{startActiveDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, END_ACTIVE_DATE = #{endActiveDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, OBJECT_VERSION_NUMBER = OBJECT_VERSION_NUMBER + 1, REQUEST_ID = #{requestId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, PROGRAM_ID = #{programId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CREATED_BY = #{createdBy,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, LAST_UPDATED_BY = #{lastUpdatedBy,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, LAST_UPDATE_DATE = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, LAST_UPDATE_LOGIN = #{lastUpdateLogin,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ATTRIBUTE_CATEGORY = #{attributeCategory,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ATTRIBUTE1 = #{attribute1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ATTRIBUTE2 = #{attribute2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ATTRIBUTE3 = #{attribute3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ATTRIBUTE4 = #{attribute4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ATTRIBUTE5 = #{attribute5,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ATTRIBUTE6 = #{attribute6,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ATTRIBUTE7 = #{attribute7,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ATTRIBUTE8 = #{attribute8,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ATTRIBUTE9 = #{attribute9,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ATTRIBUTE10 = #{attribute10,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ATTRIBUTE11 = #{attribute11,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ATTRIBUTE12 = #{attribute12,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ATTRIBUTE13 = #{attribute13,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ATTRIBUTE14 = #{attribute14,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ATTRIBUTE15 = #{attribute15,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where SALES_ORG_ID = #{salesOrgId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM SPM_SALES_ORGANIZATION_B
so.code like concat('%',concat(#{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%'))
AND so.name like concat('%',concat(#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%'))

SELECT b.SALES_ORG_ID, b.CODE, tl.NAME, tl.DESCRIPTION, b.PARENT_ORG_ID, b.MARKET_ID, b.LOCATION_ID, b.SALES_FLAG, b.DEFAULT_FLAG, b.ENABLED_FLAG, b.START_ACTIVE_DATE, b.END_ACTIVE_DATE, b.OBJECT_VERSION_NUMBER, b.REQUEST_ID, b.PROGRAM_ID, b.CREATION_DATE, b.CREATED_BY, b.LAST_UPDATED_BY, b.LAST_UPDATE_DATE, b.LAST_UPDATE_LOGIN, b.ATTRIBUTE_CATEGORY, b.ATTRIBUTE1, b.ATTRIBUTE2, b.ATTRIBUTE3, b.ATTRIBUTE4, b.ATTRIBUTE5, b.ATTRIBUTE6, b.ATTRIBUTE7, b.ATTRIBUTE8, b.ATTRIBUTE9, b.ATTRIBUTE10, b.ATTRIBUTE11, b.ATTRIBUTE12, b.ATTRIBUTE13, b.ATTRIBUTE14, b.ATTRIBUTE15 FROM SPM_SALES_ORGANIZATION_B b left outer join SPM_SALES_ORGANIZATION_TL tl on(b.SALES_ORG_ID=tl.SALES_ORG_ID AND tl.lang = #{request.locale,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) LEFT OUTER JOIN SPM_ORG_DEFINATION_B sod on b.SALES_ORG_ID=SOD.SALES_ORG_ID left outer join SPM_COMPANY_B sc on sod.COMPANY_ID=sc.COMPANY_ID where b.market_id is null and b.PARENT_ORG_ID is null and (b.END_ACTIVE_DATE > CURRENT_TIMESTAMP or b.END_ACTIVE_DATE is null) AND (sc.COMPANY_ID = (SELECT b.COMPANY_ID FROM SPM_MARKET_B b WHERE b.MARKET_ID =#{request.marketId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}) OR sc.GST_ID=(SELECT b.COMPANY_ID FROM SPM_MARKET_B b WHERE b.MARKET_ID =#{request.marketId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}))
AND sc.COMPANY_ID=#{companyId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
and b.code like concat('%',concat(#{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%'))
AND tl.name like concat('%',concat(#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%'))
select b.SALES_ORG_ID, tl.NAME from SPM_SALES_ORGANIZATION_B b left join SPM_SALES_ORGANIZATION_TL tl on (tl.SALES_ORG_ID = b.SALES_ORG_ID AND tl.lang = #{request.locale,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

SELECT
FROM SPM_SALES_ORGANIZATION_B sso WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM sys_user_role_assign sura WHERE sura.assign_type = 'SALES' AND sura.assign_value = sso.sales_org_id AND sura.user_id = #{request.userId, jdbcType=DECIMAL} AND sura.role_id = #{request.roleId, jdbcType=DECIMAL})

SELECT
FROM SPM_SALES_ORGANIZATION_B where MARKET_ID =#{marketId, jdbcType=DECIMAL}

SELECT
FROM SPM_SALES_ORGANIZATION_B sso WHERE sso.SALES_ORG_ID=sso.PARENT_ORG_ID

SELECT ssob.sales_org_id, ssot.name, smt.market_id, smb.code market_code, smt.name market_name , sodb.org_type sales_org_type FROM spm_sales_organization_b ssob LEFT JOIN spm_sales_organization_tl ssot ON ssob.sales_org_id = ssot.sales_org_id AND ssot.lang = #{request.locale,jdbcType=VARCHAR} LEFT JOIN spm_market_b smb ON smb.market_id = ssob.market_id LEFT JOIN spm_market_tl smt ON smb.market_id = smt.market_id AND smt.lang = #{request.locale,jdbcType=VARCHAR} LEFT JOIN spm_org_defination_b sodb ON ssob.sales_org_id = sodb.sales_org_id AND sodb.sales_org_flag = 'Y' where ssob.sales_org_id = #{salesOrgId, jdbcType=DECIMAL}

SELECT ssob.sales_org_id, ssot.name, ssob.market_id, smb.code market_code, smt.name market_name FROM spm_sales_organization_b ssob LEFT OUTER JOIN spm_sales_organization_tl ssot ON ssob.sales_org_id = ssot.sales_org_id AND ssot.lang = #{request.locale,jdbcType=VARCHAR,javaType=java.lang.String} LEFT OUTER JOIN spm_market_b smb ON smb.market_id = ssob.market_id LEFT OUTER JOIN spm_market_tl smt ON smb.market_id = smt.market_id AND smt.lang = #{request.locale,jdbcType=VARCHAR,javaType=java.lang.String} where ssob.market_id = #{marketId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

SELECT ssob.sales_org_id, ssot.name, ssob.market_id FROM spm_sales_organization_b ssob LEFT OUTER JOIN spm_sales_organization_tl ssot ON ssob.sales_org_id = ssot.sales_org_id AND ssot.lang = #{request.locale,jdbcType=VARCHAR,javaType=java.lang.String} where ssob.sales_org_id = #{salesOrgId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
SELECT ssob.sales_org_id, ssob.code, ssob.name FROM SPM_SALES_ORGANIZATION_B ssob WHERE ssob.default_flag='Y' AND ssob.market_id = #{marketId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
SELECT sales_org_id FROM SPM_SALES_ORGANIZATION_B ssob WHERE ssob.CODE = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select b.* FROM SPM_SALES_ORGANIZATION_B b WHERE b.MARKET_ID=#{marketId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

SELECT * FROM SPM_SALES_ORGANIZATION_B WHERE SALES_ORG_ID IN ( SELECT su.ASSIGN_VALUE FROM SYS_USER_ROLE_ASSIGN su, SPM_SALES_ORGANIZATION_TL sa WHERE USER_ID = #{request.userId, jdbcType= DECIMAL} AND ASSIGN_TYPE = 'SALES' AND su.ASSIGN_VALUE = sa.SALES_ORG_ID AND sa.LANG = 'zh_CN' AND ROLE_ID =#{roleId, jdbcType = DECIMAL})
select b.* FROM SPM_SALES_ORGANIZATION_B b WHERE b.MARKET_ID=#{marketId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
